name: Volt
description: Electricity flows through Volt. His attacks deal high damage. Enemies will be shocked.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Launch a voltaic projectile that stuns and damages its target. A chain of electricity extends from the target to shock nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Speed
abilities.description: Embody an electric current. Volt and his allies receive a brief movement speed boost and a reload speed buff.

abilities.name: Electric Shield
abilities.description: Volt deploys an electric shield that blocks projectiles.

abilities.name: Discharge
abilities.description: Volt discharges the electricity that courses through him. The shockwave paralyzes and damages nearby enemies. Enemies on the edge of the shockwave are stunned.

languages.description: Elektrizität fließt durch Volt. Seine Angriffe richten hohen Schaden an. Seine Feinde werden schockiert sein.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: L'électricité émane de Volt. Ses attaques infligent des Dégâts importants. Les ennemis seront choqués.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: Attraverso Volt scorre l'elettricità. I suoi attacchi infliggono danni elevati. I nemici saranno scioccati.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: 전류가 볼트를 통해 흐릅니다. 그의 공격은 강한 피해를 가하며, 적들은 짜릿한 충격으로 그 자리에 못박히게 됩니다.
languages.name: 볼트

languages.description: La electricidad fluye a través de Volt. Sus ataques causan mucho daño. Los enemigos quedarán aturdidos.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: 电流在 Volt 身上涌动。他的攻击可造成高额伤害，并震慑敌人。
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: Электричество течёт через Вольта. Его атаки наносят большой урон. Враги будут в шоке.
languages.name: Вольт

languages.description: Voltには電流が流れている。彼が発する電撃は敵に大ダメージを与える。
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: Elektryczność przepływa przez Volta. Jego ataki zadają duże obrażenia. Wrogowie będą zszokowani.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: A eletricidade flui através do Volt e seus ataques causam alto dano. Seus inimigos ficarão 'chocados'.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: 電流通過 Volt。他的攻擊造成高傷害。敵人會因此而休克。
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: กระแสไฟฟ้าที่ไหลผ่านตัว Volt สร้างความเสียหายได้สูง จนช็อตศัตรูให้เกิดอาการช็อกได้
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: Elektrik Volt'un damarlarında akar. Saldırıları yüksek hasar verir. Düşmanlar şok olacak.
languages.name: Volt

languages.description: Повелитель електрики. Атаки Вольта завдають великої шкоди. Вороги будуть шоковані.
languages.name: Вольт
